name: Felis Fur
description:
Grab your friends and control these mischievous kittens in their biggest heist! Remember to don't drop anything and build the highest tower of objects ever seen to reach the stars!

How to play:

1. Grab objects on the trails on the right and left side of the screen.

2. Create a tower with them!

If any object falls out of the platform or an object is not grabbed, you lose life.

Modes:

- Survival: Survive as many time as possible.

- Tower: Create the tallest tower before you die.

- Sandbox: Do whatever you want.
